channel.title: [pi] adding pk kills and editing pk points and opening interface [pi]
channel.description:
K i need help with 3 things been trying to figure them out for 3 days. Well here they are
first, i need to open a interface that will be added for most pk kills but atm the interface wont open i can do ::interface 8134 but it wont show but when i try to click the board the interface wont show i got the case below [code] case 3192: c.getPA().showInterface(8134); break; [/code]
second, i need to add pk kills to go along with my pk points when you kill them you get pk kill blah blah blah but no repeated kill to go with my pkp method
third, i want to edit my pk point method the higher kill streak your on the more point points (e.g 3 kill streak 2 points per kill, 4 kill streak 3 points, 5 kill streak 4 points, 10 kill streak 5 points)

item.title: [pi] adding pk kills and editing pk points and opening interface [pi]
item.dc:creator: @lukeashworth lukeashworth
item.description:
@lukeashworth wrote:

Heloo i feel like a idiot tbh, i have a PI server, and i wouldnt say im a rubbish coder, but it kinda has pk points on the server and i already put a shop in, but when you kill somebody if wildy it sais ive lost pk points and i can not find out where to sort this out, if somebody has tv and they can do ill be greatfull and maybe pay through paypal

case 3192:

break;

item.title: [pi] adding pk kills and editing pk points and opening interface [pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

1.um i have it in action handler and clicking buttons ima have to add this in i tried too but got a compiling error

public void highscores() {
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); // Title
		sendQuest("@dre@ (¯`·._.·´¯`·->Top Pkers< -·´¯`·._.·´¯) ", 8145);
		for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to
			// display more, simply the number you
			// want it to display, say 20 = for(int
			// i = 0; i < 20; i++)
			if (server.ranks[i] > 0) {
				sendQuest("@bla@Rank " + (i + 1) + ": @red@"
						+ server.rankPpl[i] + "@bla@ - Kills:@whi@ "
						+ server.ranks[i], 8147 + i);
			}
		}
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
		resetRanks();
	}

error

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:201: illegal start of expression
public void highscores() {
^
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:201: illegal start of expression
public void highscores() {
       ^
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:201: ';' expected
public void highscores() {
                      ^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

2.yes

brb in 15 mins but ty for helping me so far =p

item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]1; Make sure it’s the correct ActionButton.

2; You mean a separate kill message, depending on how many kills you have? (If not, please elaborate more.)

3; You need to create a kill integer.[/quote]

  1. Interface is correct isnt the case the object id? When i click it i dont get no case so i put the object id since usually what is is.

  2. Just basically i need to add pk kills i got pk points but its pcpoints but when you kill a person you get points

  3. ill do when i get the first too this is basically off those 2
